title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 355.1 - Definition
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 355.1 - Definition

State Regulations

The term peace officer means a person designated by law who
is authorized to exercise peace officer powers when acting pursuant to his or
her special duties. Persons designated as peace officers include probation
officers. For purposes of the Executive Law, Criminal Procedure Law and Family

Court Act, probation officer trainees shall be considered probation
officers. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9

355.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
